title: Track fault causing delays on East West Line

title_translations.zh-Hans: 股道故障导致东西线延误
title_translations.ms: Kerosakan trek menyebabkan kelewatan di Laluan Timur Barat
title_translations.ta: கிழக்கு மேற்கு பாதையில் தாமதத்தை ஏற்படுத்தும் தடக் கோளாறு

updates.text: [EWL] Free bus service at Boon Lay station has ceased.
Train services between #Queenstown and #BoonLay have resumed. we apologise for the inconvenience caused.
Trains will be slower between #Queenstown to #BoonLay due to track fault near #Clementi. Free bus services available between both stations.
Estimate 15 mins additional travelling time from #Queenstown to #BoonLay in both directions.
[EWL]: Estimate 15 mins additional travelling time from #Queenstown to #BoonLay in both directions due to track fault.
[EWL]: Estimate 15 mins additional travelling time from #Queenstown  to #BoonLay towards Joo Koon due to track fault.
Free bus service is activated between Boon Lay and Queenstown both bounds due to track fault.
[EWL]: Estimate 20 mins additional travelling time from #TanjongPagar to #JurongEast towards JooKoon due to track fault.
